question:
At present (2021), through which of the following, allocation of foodgrains is done for poor people of India?
  1. National Food Security Act (NFSA)
  2. Pradhan Mantri Garib Kalyan Anna Yojana (PM-GKAY)
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: During the Financial Year 2020-21, allocation of foodgrains has been done through two channels- under the National Food Security Act (NFSA) and the Pradhan Mantri Garib Kalyan Anna Yojana (PM-GKAY) scheme.
